author: Special Correspondent
text:
Collector V. Rajaraman launched ‘Amma’ mobile phone scheme for self-help group trainers in Virudhunagar district on Tuesday by distributing the gadget to 512 trainers.

Speaking on the occasion, Mr. Rajaraman said that mobile phones had been provided to 305 trainers under Rural Livelihood Mission and 207 trainers under Pudu Vaazhvu Thittam.

The special software in the mobile phones would render information management easier for the trainers, according to an official press release issued here.
title: Collector distributes ‘Amma’ mobile phones
